DOC.brief_summary: This study double-blind randomized clinical trial , conduct examine effect multivitamin ( include B , C , E ) HIV disease progression among HIV-positive Tanzanian adult men woman take highly active anti-retroviral therapy ( HAART ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Trial Vitamins HAART HIV Disease Progression
DOC.detailed_description: Access Highly Active Anti-Retroviral Therapy ( HAART ) treatment HIV develop region limit , gradually become standard care country . Multivitamin supplement demonstrate immune-enhancing effect among individual pre-HAART HIV disease stage . However , efficacy safety micronutrient supplement need document context HAART . This study double-blind randomized clinical trial , conduct examine effect multivitamin ( include B , C , E ) HIV disease progression among individual take HAART . Participants HIV-positive Tanzanian men woman age 18 year old , initiate HAART time randomization . Eligible individual randomize receive daily oral supplement one two intervention group : ) multivitamins single Recommended Dietary Allowance ( RDA ) level ; b ) multivitamins multiple RDA dos use previous study `` A Trial Vitamins HIV Progression Transmission '' .
DOC.criteria: HIVpositive Men Women 18 Years Age old Initiating HAART time randomization Pregnant Lactating Women Individuals preHAART disease stage BMI less 16
